   19: %%
   20: 
   21: %%
   22: %% Test service and transport config. In particular, of the detection
   23: %% of config errors.
   24: %%
   25: 
   26: -module(diameter_config_SUITE).
   27: 
   28: %% testscases, no common_test dependency
   29: -export([run/0,
   30:          run/1]).
   31: 
   32: %% common_test wrapping
   33: -export([
   34:          %% Framework functions
   35:          suite/0,
   36:          all/0,
   37:          init_per_suite/1,
   38:          end_per_suite/1,
   39: 
   40:          %% The test cases
   41:          start_service/1,
   42:          add_transport/1]).
   43: 
   44: -include("diameter_util.hrl").
   45: 
   46: %% Lists of {Key, GoodConfigList, BadConfigList} with which to
   47: %% configure.
   48: 
   49: -define(SERVICE_CONFIG,
   50:         [{application,
   51:           [[[{dictionary, diameter_gen_base_rfc6733},
   52:              {module, ?MODULE}]]
   53:            | [[[{dictionary, D},
   54:                 {module, M},
   55:                 {alias, A},
   56:                 {state, S},
   57:                 {answer_errors, AE},
   58:                 {request_errors, RE},
   59:                 {call_mutates_state, C}]]
   60:               || D <- [diameter_gen_base_rfc3588, diameter_gen_base_rfc6733],
   61:                  M <- [?MODULE, [?MODULE, diameter_lib:now()]],
   62:                  A <- [0, common, make_ref()],
   63:                  S <- [[], make_ref()],
   64:                  AE <- [report, callback, discard],
   65:                  RE <- [answer_3xxx, answer, callback],
   66:                  C <- [true, false]]],
   67:           [[x],
   68:            [[]],
   69:            [[{dictionary, diameter_gen_base_rfc3588}]],
   70:            [[{module, ?MODULE}]]
   71:            | [[[{dictionary, diameter_gen_base_rfc6733},
   72:                 {module, ?MODULE},
   73:                 {K,x}]]
   74:               || K <- [answer_errors,
   75:                        request_errors,
   76:                        call_mutates_state]]]},
   77:          {restrict_connections,
   78:           [[false], [node], [nodes], [[node(), node()]]],
   79:           []},
   80:          {sequence,
   81:           [[{0,32}], [{1,31}]],
   82:           [[{2,31}]]},
   83:          {share_peers,
   84:           [[true],
   85:            [false],
   86:            [[node()]]],
   87:           [[x]]},
   88:          {use_shared_peers,
   89:           [[true],
   90:            [false],
   91:            [[node(), node()]]],
   92:           [[x]]},
   93:          {string_decode,
   94:           [[true], [false]],
   95:           [[0], [x]]},
   96:          {incoming_maxlen,
   97:           [[0], [65536], [16#FFFFFF]],
   98:           [[-1], [1 bsl 24], [infinity], [false]]},
   99:          {spawn_opt,
  100:           [[[]], [[monitor, link]]],
  101:           [[false]]},
  102:          {invalid_option,  %% invalid service options are rejected
  103:           [],
  104:           [[x],
  105:            [x,x]]}]).
  106: 
  107: -define(TRANSPORT_CONFIG,
  108:         [{transport_module,
  109:           [[?MODULE]],
  110:           [[[?MODULE]]]},
  111:          {transport_config,
  112:           [[{}, 3000],
  113:            [{}, infinity]],
  114:           [[{}, x]]},
  115:          {applications,
  116:           [[[1, a, [x]]]],
  117:           [[x]]},
  118:          {capabilities,
  119:           [[[{'Origin-Host', "diameter.erlang.org"}]],
  120:            [[{'Origin-Realm', "erlang.org"}]]]
  121:           ++ [[[{'Host-IP-Address', L}]]
  122:               || L <- [[{127,0,0,1}],
  123:                        ["127.0.0.1"],
  124:                        ["127.0.0.1", "FFFF::1", "::1", {1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8}]]]
  125:           ++ [[[{'Product-Name', N}]]
  126:               || N <- [["Product", $-, ["Name"]],
  127:                        "Norðurálfa",
  128:                        "ᚠᚢᚦᚨᚱᚲ"]]
  129:           ++ [[[{K,V}]]
  130:               || K <- ['Vendor-Id',
  131:                        'Origin-State-Id',
  132:                        'Firmware-Revision'],
  133:                  V <- [0, 256, 16#FFFF]]
  134:           ++ [[[{K,V}]]
  135:               || K <- ['Supported-Vendor-Id',
  136:                        'Auth-Application-Id',
  137:                        'Acct-Application-Id',
  138:                        'Inband-Security-Id'],
  139:                  V <- [[17], [0, 256, 16#FFFF]]]
  140:           ++ [[[{'Vendor-Specific-Application-Id',
  141:                  [[{'Vendor-Id', V},
  142:                    {'Auth-Application-Id', [0]},
  143:                    {'Acct-Application-Id', [4]}]]}]]
  144:               || V <- [1, [1]]],
  145:           [[x], [[{'Origin-Host', "ᚠᚢᚦᚨᚱᚲ"}]]]
  146:           ++ [[[{'Host-IP-Address', A}]]
  147:               || A <- [{127,0,0,1}]]
  148:           ++ [[[{'Product-Name', N}]]
  149:               || N <- [x, 1]]
  150:           ++ [[[{K,V}]]
  151:               || K <- ['Vendor-Id',
  152:                        'Origin-State-Id',
  153:                        'Firmware-Revision'],
  154:                  V <- [x, [0], -1, 1 bsl 32]]
  155:           ++ [[[{K,V}]]
  156:               || K <- ['Supported-Vendor-Id',
  157:                        'Auth-Application-Id',
  158:                        'Acct-Application-Id',
  159:                        'Inband-Security-Id'],
  160:                  V <- [x, 17, [-1], [1 bsl 32]]]
  161:           ++ [[[{'Vendor-Specific-Application-Id', V}]]
  162:               || V <- [x,
  163:                        [[{'Vendor-Id', 1 bsl 32}]],
  164:                        [[{'Auth-Application-Id', 1}]]]]},
  165:          {capabilities_cb,
  166:           [[x]],
  167:           []},
  168:          {capx_timeout,
  169:           [[3000]],
  170:           [[{?MODULE, tmo, []}]]},
  171:          {disconnect_cb,
  172:           [[x]],
  173:           []},
  174:          {length_errors,
  175:           [[exit], [handle], [discard]],
  176:           [[x]]},
  177:          {dpr_timeout,
  178:           [[0], [3000], [16#FFFFFFFF]],
  179:           [[infinity], [-1], [1 bsl 32], [x]]},
  180:          {dpa_timeout,
  181:           [[0], [3000], [16#FFFFFFFF]],
  182:           [[infinity], [-1], [1 bsl 32], [x]]},
  183:          {connect_timer,
  184:           [[3000]],
  185:           [[infinity]]},
  186:          {watchdog_timer,
  187:           [[3000],
  188:            [{?MODULE, tmo, []}]],
  189:           [[infinity],
  190:            [-1]]},
  191:          {watchdog_config,
  192:           [[[{okay, 0}, {suspect, 0}]],
  193:            [[{okay, 1}]],
  194:            [[{suspect, 2}]]],
  195:           [[x],
  196:            [[{open, 0}]]]},
  197:          {pool_size,
  198:           [[1], [100]],
  199:           [[0], [infinity], [-1], [x]]},
  200:          {private,
  201:           [[x]],
  202:           []},
  203:          {spawn_opt,
  204:           [[[]], [[monitor, link]]],
  205:           [[false]]},
  206:          {invalid_option,  %% invalid transport options are silently ignored
  207:           [[x],
  208:            [x,x]],
  209:           []}]).
  210: 
  211: 
  212: -define(CL(F),    ?CL(F, [])).
  213: -define(CL(F, A), ?LOG("DCONF", F, A)).
  214: 
  215: 
  216: %% ===========================================================================
  217: 
  218: suite() ->
  219:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 15}}].
  220: 
  221: all() ->
  222:     [
  223:      start_service,
  224:      add_transport
  225:     ].
  226: 
  227: 
  228: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  229:     ?DUTIL:init_per_suite(Config).
  230: 
  231: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  232:     ?DUTIL:end_per_suite(Config).
  233: 
  234: 
  235: start_service(Config) ->
  236:     ?CL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  237:     put(dia_factor, dia_factor(Config)),
  238:     Res = run([?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  239:     ?CL("~w -> done when"
  240:         "~n   Res: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Res]),
  241:     Res.
  242: 
  243: add_transport(Config) ->
  244:     ?CL("~w -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  245:     put(dia_factor, dia_factor(Config)),
  246:     Res = run([?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  247:     ?CL("~w -> done when"
  248:         "~n   Res: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Res]),
  249:     Res.
  250: 
  251: dia_factor(Config) ->
  252:     {value, {?FUNCTION_NAME, DiaFactor}} =
  253:         lists:keysearch(?FUNCTION_NAME, 1, Config),
  254:     DiaFactor.
  255: 
  256: %% ===========================================================================
  257: 
  258: %% Factor: >= 1
  259: to(Base, Factor) when (Factor >= 0) ->
  260:     round(Base * (((Factor-1) + 10) / 10)).
  261: 
  262: run() ->
  263:     run(all()).
  264: 
  265: run(List)
  266:   when is_list(List) ->
  267:     BaseTo = 5000,
  268:     To = case get(dia_factor) of
  269:              undefined ->
  270:                  BaseTo;
  271:              DF when is_integer(DF) ->
  272:                  to(BaseTo, DF)
  273:          end,
  274:     ?CL("~w -> timeout calculated to ~w", [?FUNCTION_NAME, To]),
  275:     try
  276:         ?RUN([[[fun run/1, {F, To}] || F <- List]])
  277:     after
  278:         dbg:stop(),
  279:         diameter:stop()
  280:     end;
  281: 
  282: run({F, Tmo}) ->
  283:     ?CL("~w -> entry - try start diameter", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  284:     ok = diameter:start(),
  285:     try
  286:         ?CL("~w -> try - run ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, F]),
  287:         ?RUN([{[fun run/1, F], Tmo}])
  288:     after
  289:         ?CL("~w -> after - try stop diameter", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
  290:         ok = diameter:stop()
  291:     end;
  292: 
  293: run(start_service = Case) ->
  294:     ?CL("~w(~w) -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Case]),
  295:     ?RUN([[fun start/1, T]
  296:                || T <- [lists:keyfind(capabilities, 1, ?TRANSPORT_CONFIG)
  297:                        | ?SERVICE_CONFIG]]);
  298: 
  299: run(add_transport = Case) ->
  300:     ?CL("~w(~w) -> entry", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Case]),
  301:     ?RUN([[fun add/1, T] || T <- ?TRANSPORT_CONFIG]).
  302: 
  303: start(T) ->
  304:     ?CL("~w -> entry with"
  305:         "~n   T: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, T]),
  306:     do(fun start/3, T).
  307: 
  308: add(T) ->
  309:     ?CL("~w -> entry with"
  310:         "~n   T: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, T]),
  311:     do(fun add/3, T).
  312: 
  313: 
  314: %% ===========================================================================
  315: 
  316: %% do/2
  317: 
  318: do(F, {Key, Good, Bad}) ->
  319:     ?CL("~w -> entry with"
  320:         "~n   Key:  ~p"
  321:         "~n   Good: ~p"
  322:         "~n   Bad:  ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Key, Good, Bad]),
  323:     F(Key, Good, Bad).
  324: 
  325: %% add/3
  326: 
  327: add(Key, Good, Bad) ->
  328:     ?CL("~w -> entry with"
  329:         "~n   Key:  ~p"
  330:         "~n   Good: ~p"
  331:         "~n   Bad:  ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Key, Good, Bad]),
  332:     {[],[]} = {[{Vs,T} || Vs <- Good,
  333:                           T <- [add(Key, Vs)],
  334:                           [T] /= [T || {ok,_} <- [T]]],
  335:                [{Vs,T} || Vs <- Bad,
  336:                           T <- [add(Key, Vs)],
  337:                           [T] /= [T || {error,_} <- [T]]]}.
  338: 
  339: add(Key, Vs) ->
  340:     ?CL("~w -> entry with"
  341:         "~n   Key: ~p"
  342:         "~n   Vs:  ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Key, Vs]),
  343:     T = list_to_tuple([Key | Vs]),
  344:     diameter:add_transport(make_ref(), {connect, [T]}).
  345: 
  346: %% start/3
  347: 
  348: start(Key, Good, Bad) ->
  349:     ?CL("~w -> entry with"
  350:         "~n   Key:  ~p"
  351:         "~n   Good: ~p"
  352:         "~n   Bad:  ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Key, Good, Bad]),
  353:     {[],[]} = {[{Vs,T} || Vs <- Good,
  354:                           T <- [start(Key, Vs)],
  355:                           T /= ok],
  356:                [{Vs,T} || Vs <- Bad,
  357:                           T <- [start(Key, Vs)],
  358:                           [T] /= [T || {error,_} <- [T]]]}.
  359: 
  360: start(capabilities = K, [Vs]) ->
  361:     ?CL("~w -> entry with"
  362:         "~n   K:  ~p"
  363:         "~n   Vs: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, K, Vs]),
  364:     if is_list(Vs) ->
  365:             start(make_ref(), Vs ++ apps(K));
  366:        true ->
  367:             {error, Vs}
  368:     end;
  369: 
  370: start(Key, Vs)
  371:   when is_atom(Key) ->
  372:     ?CL("~w -> entry with"
  373:         "~n   Key: ~p"
  374:         "~n   Vs:  ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Key, Vs]),
  375:     start(make_ref(), [list_to_tuple([Key | Vs]) | apps(Key)]);
  376: 
  377: start(SvcName, Opts) ->
  378:     try
  379:         ?CL("~w -> [try] - start service: "
  380:             "~n   SvcName: ~p"
  381:             "~n   Opts:    ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, SvcName, Opts]),
  382:         Res1 = diameter:start_service(SvcName, Opts),
  383:         ?CL("~w -> [try] - start service result: "
  384:             "~n   Res: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Res1]),
  385:         Res1
  386:     after
  387:         ?CL("~w -> [after] - try stop service: "
  388:             "~n   SvcName: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, SvcName]),
  389:         Res2 = diameter:stop_service(SvcName),
  390:         ?CL("~w -> [after] - stop service result: "
  391:             "~n   Res: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, Res2]),
  392:         Res2
  393:     end.
  394: 
  395: apps(application) ->
  396:     [];
  397: apps(_) ->
  398:     [{application, [{dictionary, diameter_gen_base_rfc6733},
  399:                     {module, ?MODULE}]}].
